amendment.description: To make available amounts authorized to be appropriated for the repair and reconstruction of the Interstate I-35W bridge that collapsed on August 1, 2007, in Minneapolis Minnesota.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2816 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2816 proposed by Senator Klobuchar. (consideration: CR S11359, S11375, S11377-11378, S11381; text: CR S11359) To make available amounts authorized to be appropriated for the repair and reconstruction of the Interstate I-35W bridge that collapsed on August 1, 2007, in Minneapolis Minnesota.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2816 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2816 proposed by Senator Klobuchar.
